author: wn.com
title: CTU President Richard Wagstaff's acceptance speech (NZCTU - New Zealand Council of Trade Unions)
text: ( Source : NZCTU - New Zealand Council of Trade Unions ) E ngā mana, e ngā reo, e ngā karangatanga maha, tēnā koutou I am both honoured and humbled to be taking up the role of CTU President . I want to thank the PSA and the EPMU for nominating
